scripts.install-prod: npm un @viur/vue-utils && npm i @viur/vue-utils && npm un --prefix ../packages/vi-vue-components/components @viur/vue-utils && npm i --prefix ../packages/vi-vue-components/components @viur/vue-utils && npm un @viur/vue-components && npm i @viur/vue-components && npm i
scripts.install-dev: npm un --prefix ../packages/vi-vue-components/components @viur/vue-utils && npm i --prefix ../packages/vi-vue-components/components ../packages/vi-vue-utils/packages/viur-vue-utils && npm un @viur/vue-utils && npm i ../packages/vi-vue-utils/packages/viur-vue-utils && npm un @viur/vue-components && npm i ../packages/vi-vue-components/components && npm i --prefix ../packages/vi-vue-components/components && npm i --prefix ../packages/vi-vue-utils/packages/viur-vue-utils && npm i
